bio: Gordon Ramsay is a British chef and restaurateur. He has been awarded a total of 16 Michelin stars for his restaurants.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.method: 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 2. Add chicken and cook until browned, about 4-5 minutes. 3. Add sliced bell pepper and onion, and cook for another 4-5 minutes. 4. Add fajita seasoning and cook for another 2-3 minutes. 5. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Guacamole
recipes.method: 1. Cut the avocado in half and remove the pit. 2. Mash the avocado in a bowl. 3. Add lime juice, chopped cilantro, diced tomato, and finely chopped onion. 4. Mix well. 5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 6. Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Beef Enchiladas
recipes.method: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Brown ground beef in a skillet. 3. Add diced onion and cook until onion is soft. 4. Add enchilada sauce and cook for 5 minutes. 5. In a separate skillet, heat up tortillas until they are pliable. 6. Spread beef mixture on each tortilla and sprinkle with cheddar cheese. 7. Roll up the tortillas and place in a baking dish. 8. Cover with remaining enchilada sauce and cheese. 9. Bake for 20 minutes. 10. Serve hot.

bio: Julia Child was an American chef, author, and television personality. She is best known for her cookbook 'Mastering the Art of French Cooking.'
